The graphic juxtaposes photos of two rep: s Army (NPA) with photos of Sarah Elago, a Philippine legislator representing a youth party in the Philippine Congress.
The Tagalog: language text overlaid in the graphic accuses Elago of being a CPP-NPA recruiter of the youth.
The original photo: which the doctored image was based on, was published by the Associated Press (AP) news agency on November 23, 2016, and features a 24-year-old NPA guerrilla named "Comrade Katryn."
